mapper.insert: INSERT INTO taiko_songlist ( song_name, song_genre, difficulty ) VALUES ( #{songs}, #{songGenre}, #{difficulty} )
INSERT INTO taiko_board ( user_name, user_profile, contents, file_no, created_time, password ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{userProfile}, #{contents}, #{fileNo}, NOW(), #{password} )

INSERT INTO taiko_board_reply ( board_no, user_name, user_profile, contents, file_no, created_time, password ) VALUES ( #{boardNo}, #{userName}, #{userProfile}, #{comments}, #{fileNo}, NOW(), #{password} )
mapper.select: select t1.reply_no as replyNo, t1.board_no as boardNo, t1.user_name as userName, t1.user_profile as userProfile, t1.contents as contents, t1.created_time as createdTime, t2.file_no as fileNo, t2.file_path as filePath, t2.file_name as fileName from taiko_board_reply t1 left outer join taiko_board_file t2 on t1.file_no = t2.file_no where t1.board_no = '${boardNo}'
